title: Need help to find the name on this antiqva font :)
content:
Ive seen this font been used different places and it has a nice round feeling to it.. does anybody know the name of it: [http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8190/8366317222\_a2a58f5964.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020051848/http:/farm9.staticflickr.com/8190/8366317222_a2a58f5964.jpg "http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8190/8366317222\_a2a58f5964.jpg")

Thank you! :D
author: marenhei

comments.content: Wuhuu - that is off course correct! Than you so much "akira1975"! :)
